title: ANELLO launches compact navigation system for resilient drone operations
description:
ANELLO has developed an inertial navigation system based on its SiPhOG technology for reliable navigation in GNSS-denied environments.

The post ANELLO launches compact navigation system for resilient drone operations appeared first on The Robot Report.
content:
ANELLO has developed an inertial navigation system based on its SiPhOG technology for reliable navigation in GNSS-denied environments.

The post ANELLO launches compact navigation system for resilient drone operations appeared first on The Robot Report.
